query: SELECT c.id, c.contextId, COUNT(u.id) as message_count FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN utterances u ON c.id = u.conversationId GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC LIMIT 10;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LnWcAriB6UDfVBW.root --database 6TyQvWdwhpeQGG2hvgWtQa --execute SELECT c.id, c.contextId, COUNT(u.id) as message_count FROM conversations c LEFT JOIN utterances u ON c.id = u.conversationId GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC LIMIT 10;
logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'u.conversationid' in 'on clause'
